meta_title: Sensorius Definition: The Industrial Digital Nervous System
meta_description: Sensorius defines the sensory network of industrial assets. This guide explains the Latin root and its application in modern predictive maintenance and IIoT.
title: Sensorius Definition
image_prompt: A high-tech factory floor at night with glowing blue and amber data overlays tracing from a robotic arm to a central server. A female maintenance manager in a smart helmet and high-visibility vest inspects a digital tablet showing complex waveforms. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, industrial aesthetic.
